_header: Saint Quintin the martyr of the country was of Rome
Subjects: saints’ lives; Quintin, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Quintin in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Quintyn þe martyr of þe contreie was of romeVor
                    godes loue he þolede much as he to heuene come…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Hi seie heuene openy þet aȝen In heo flei anonNou
                    god uor þe loue of seynt qiutyne ous bringe þuder echon

Bod779.First Lines:
seint quintin þe marter of þe contre was of romefor
                    goddus loue he þolid deþ or he to heuin come…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Þey seyȝ heuin opin þer aȝen in he fley
                    anonnow god for þe loue of hym bring vs þedir echon

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint quyntyn þe martir of þe countreie of Romeffor godes
                    loue þolede deþ er he to heuen come…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…þei seyen heuen opene þer aȝein & he fley in
                    anonGod for þe loue of seint quintyn þider vs bring
                    echon
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayne quentyne þe haly martir of þe contre of Romeffor
                    goddeȝ lufe he tholed mekil or he to heuene comeAn Emperoure þer
                    was at Rome þat hight MaximianHe garte torment whore so he fande any
                    cristen man…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…And heuen opend þer agayne with ioy & myrth gude
                    woneNowe godde for lufe of Sayne Quintyne brynge vs þedre
                    ilkone

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Quyntyn þe martyr of þe countre was of Romeffor
                    godes loue he þolede muche ar he to heuene come…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Hi seye heuene openy þer aȝen yn he ffley anonNow
                    god ffor þe loue of Seint Quyntyn bringe vs þuder echon

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint quintyn þe marter of þe contre was of romefor god
                    he þoled muche or he to heuene come…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…hii sey heuene opene hure aȝen In heo fley anonnow god
                    for þe loue of seint quintyn ous bringe þuder echon

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEyn quintyn þe martir of þe contrei was of romefor godes loue he þoleþe moche ar he to heuen come…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …hi seie heuen openy him aȝen in he flei anonnou god for þe loue of seyn quintin ous bring þuþer echon
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxxii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 158v).

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEin quintin þe martir of þe contreie was of romefor godes loue he þolede muche ar he to heuene come…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …hy seie heuene openi þer aȝen In he flei anonNou god for þe loue of sein quintin  us bringe þuder echon

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint Quintin þe martir of þe contray was of Romeffor godes loue he þolede deþ er he to heuene come…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Hi seȝe heuene openy þer aȝen in he fleȝ anonNou god for þe lous of Seint quintin ous bringe þider echon

BLSto949.First Lines: Seyn quyntyn þe martyr of þe cuntrey was of Romeffor godes loue he þolede moche ar he to heuene come…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …hii sey heuene openy þeraȝen in heo fley anonNou god for loue of Seyn Quyntyn vs brynge þyder echon

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Quintyne þe martir of þe cuntrey was of RomeMiche
                    he þoled for goddes love er he to heuen come…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Þai seen heuen open þeraȝeyn & in he flagh
                    anonNow god for þe love of saynt Quintyn bringe vs þider ychone
                    Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Quintyne þe marter was of þe contre of RomeFor
                    goddis loue he þoled pyne er he to heuene come…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…And heuene opned it aȝein and Inne it fle anonNow god
                    for þe loue of seynt Quintyne bryng vs þider echon
